expo.name: UniTrade
expo.description: UniTrade is a campus marketplace connecting university students to buy and sell products within their community. Browse thousands of items, list products instantly, and connect with fellow students safely.

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: UniTrade needs access to your camera to take photos of products you want to sell.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: UniTrade needs access to your photo library to select product images for your listings.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: UniTrade needs permission to save product images to your photo library.

plugins.photosPermission: UniTrade needs access to your photos to upload product images.
plugins.cameraPermission: UniTrade needs access to your camera to take product photos.
